verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> that came to Joel <WH3100> the son <WH1121> of Pethuel <WH6602>.

Hear <WH8085> this <WH2205>, you old men, and give ear <WH238>, all you inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>. Has this been in your days <WH3117>, or even <WH518> in the days <WH3117> of your fathers <WH1>?
Tell <WH5608> your sons <WH1121> of it <WH1121>, and let your sons tell their sons <WH1121>, and their sons <WH1121> another <WH312> generation <WH1755>.

That which the palmerworm <WH1501> has left <WH3499> has the locust <WH697> eaten <WH398>; and that which the locust <WH697> has left <WH3499> has the cankerworm <WH3218> eaten <WH398>; and that which the cankerworm <WH3218> has left <WH3499> has the caterpillar <WH2625> eaten <WH398>.

Awake <WH6974>, you drunkards <WH7910>, and weep <WH1058>; and howl <WH3213>, all you drinkers <WH8354> of wine <WH3196>, because of the new wine <WH6071>; for it is cut off <WH3772> from your mouth <WH6310>.

For a nation <WH1471> is come up <WH5927> upon my land <WH776>, strong <WH6099>, and without number <WH4557>, whose teeth <WH8127> are the teeth <WH8127> of a lion <WH738>, and he has the cheek teeth <WH4973> of a great lion <WH3833>.

He has laid <WH7760> my vine <WH1612> waste <WH8047>, and barked <WH7111> my fig tree <WH8384>: he has made it clean <WH2834> bare <WH2834>, and cast it away <WH7993>; the branches <WH8299> there are made white <WH3835>.
Lament <WH421> like a virgin <WH1330> girded <WH2296> with sackcloth <WH8242> for the husband <WH1167> of her youth <WH5271>.

The food offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is cut off <WH3772> from the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068>; the priests <WH3548>, the Lord <WH3068>'s ministers <WH8334>, mourn <WH56>.
The field <WH7704> is wasted <WH7703>, the land <WH127> mourns <WH56>; for the corn <WH1715> is wasted <WH7703>: the new wine <WH8492> is dried up <WH3001>, the oil <WH3323> languishes <WH535>.

Be you ashamed <WH3001>, O you husbandmen <WH406>; howl <WH3213>, O you vinedressers <WH3755>, for the wheat <WH2406> and for the barley <WH8184>; because the harvest <WH7105> of the field <WH7704> is perished <WH6>.

The vine <WH1612> is dried up <WH3001>, and the fig tree <WH8384> languishes <WH535>; the pomegranate <WH7416> tree <WH8558>, the palm tree also <WH8598>, and the apple tree, even all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>, are withered <WH3001>: because joy <WH8342> is withered away <WH3001> from the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120>.

Clothe <WH2296> yourselves <WH5594>, and lament, you priests <WH3548>: howl <WH3213>, you ministers <WH8334> of the altar <WH4196>: come <WH935>, lie all night <WH3885> in sackcloth <WH8242>, you ministers <WH8334> of my God <WH430>: for the food offering <WH4503> and the drink offering <WH5262> is withheld <WH4513> from the house <WH1004> of your God <WH430>.

Sanctify <WH6942> a fast <WH6685>, call <WH7121> a solemn assembly <WH6116>, gather <WH622> the elders <WH2205> and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into the house <WH1004> of the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and cry <WH2199> unto the Lord <WH3068>,
Alas <WH162> for the day <WH3117>! for the day <WH3117> of the Lord <WH3068> is at hand <WH7138>, and as a destruction <WH7701> from the Almighty <WH7706> shall it come <WH935>.
Is not the food <WH400> cut off <WH3772> before our eyes <WH5869>, Yes <WH8057>, joy and gladness <WH1524> from the house <WH1004> of our God <WH430>?

The seed <WH6507> is rotten <WH5685> under their clods <WH4053>, the garners <WH214> are laid desolate <WH8074>, the barns <WH4460> are broken down <WH2040>; for the corn <WH1715> is withered <WH3001>.

How do the animals <WH929> groan <WH584>! the herds <WH5739> of cattle <WH1241> are perplexed <WH943>, because they have no pasture <WH4829>; Yes <WH5739>, the flocks of sheep <WH6629> are made desolate <WH816>.

O Lord <WH3068>, to you will I cry <WH7121>: for the fire <WH784> has devoured <WH398> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness <WH4057>, and the flame <WH3852> has burned <WH3857> all the trees <WH6086> of the field <WH7704>.

The animals <WH929> of the field <WH7704> cry <WH6165> also unto you <WH650>: for the rivers of waters <WH4325> are dried up <WH3001>, and the fire <WH784> has devoured <WH398> the pastures <WH4999> of the wilderness <WH4057>.
